Summary: Object that appears to be a star on first glance.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around October 4th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen this object for months. Always in the southwest sky.It appears at first glance to be a very bright star. You could think it was Venus. This object hovers for 20 minutes , then it moves. It is under the cloud cover and descends in front of the mountain range, mountain range. On this particular night, it changed shapes . it was round then changed into an oval . It pulsed and emitted light. I had two friends who witnessed it from a different location.
